title: The wonderfull vvoorkmanship of the world wherin is conteined an excellent discourse of Christian naturall philosophie, concernyng the fourme, knowledge, and vse of all thinges created: specially gathered out of the fountaines of holy Scripture, by Lambertus Dan√¶us: and now Englished, by T.T.
author: Daneau, Lambert, ca. 1530-1595?
